# This file contains encoded values for sprites in the game
# Each sprite is 16x16, stored in 64 lines with 4 pixels on each line
# Each pixel has the possibility for 6 colors, and information is stored in 3 bits:
# 000 - Black (R = 0, G = 0, B = 0)
# 001 - Blue (R = 99, G = 155, B = 255)
# 010 - Yellow (R = 251, G = 242, B = 54)
# 011 - Red (R = 255, G = 50, B = 50)
# 100 - Crimson (R = 172, G = 50, B = 50)
# 111 - White (R = 255, G = 255, B = 255)
# Here is the format:
# [Start(2)] [First Pixel(3)] [Second Pixel(3)] [Third Pixel(3)] [Fourth Pixel(3)] [End(2)]
# [Start(2)] - Unused (Always 00)
# [End(2)] - Unused (Always 00)

# SPRITE ID'S
# 0 - Empty
# 1 - Pacdot
# 2 - Short Corner (Bottom Left)
# 3 - Short Corner (Bottom Right)
# 4 - Short Corner (Top Left)
# 5 - Short Corner (Top Right)
# 6 - Wall (Down)
# 7 - Wall (Left)
# 8 - Wall (Right)
# 9 - Wall (Up)
# 10 - Big Corner (Bottom Left)
# 11 - Big Corner (Bottom Right)
# 12 - Big Corner (Top Left)
# 13 - Big Corner (Top Right)

# Empty [0]
# No need to store, just paint all black

# Pacdot [1]
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0001001001001000
0001001001001000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0001001001001000
0001001001001000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0001001001001000
0001001001001000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0001001001001000
0001001001001000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0001001001001000
0001001001001000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0001001001001000
0001001001001000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0001001001001000
0001001001001000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0001001001001000
0001001001001000
0000000000000000

0000000000000000

0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
0000000000000000
